name: SNAGEMON - A Grunt Dating Sim
description:
GOTTA SNAG'EM ALL!

...But what to do when you already have?

Bored with your hum-drum life as a SnaggeMon Master, you find yourself once again running errands for the Professor and the SnaggeMon Champion's League. Of course, not all goes as expected, when you're taken hostage by a handsome (albeit irritating) Team Golde grunt!

Will this encounter be yet another one-hit-KO and run? Or...Is it possible that perhaps something more can blossom?

- Gender-Neutral, masculine love-interest experience!

- Fully voiced!

The following game demo contains: SUGGESTIVE THEMES, FREQUENT USE OF PROFANITIES.  

This game is intended to be parodical in nature. For the optimal playing experience, please download/play on a Windows PC computer. (The following page was created/written/set up by Lauren Harris, and is not a direct reflection of Reece Bridger or his affiliated brand/works.)

--------------------------

Concept by: Reece Bridger and Lauren Harris

Writing: Reece Bridger

Fanservice Writing/Romance Writing Consultation: Lauren Harris

Team Golde Grunt, Garrett, and Rival Bram voiced by REECE BRIDGER: https://twitter.com/reece_bridger

Professor Magenta and Team Golde Leader, Darius, voiced by TOM SCHALK: https://twitter.com/TomStheVoice

Art [Sprites, backgrounds, animation, ETC..]: Lauren Harris

Music by Karugamo BGM: https://karugamobgm.com/

Programmed using TyranoBuilder by: Lauren Harris
